revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=MI424WR |revision=Rev E |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=08/14/2008 |fcc_date=08/24/2006 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router, FiOS modem |fcc_id=LNQ802MAG |ic_id= |pwr_v=10 |pwr_amp=1.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN5020 |cpu1_cspeed=300 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29GL128EHT2I-90G |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16CG-3C |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Actiontec 802MAG |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2413 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Micrel |sw_model=KSZ8995MA |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=MoCA 1.0 |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=XXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^[A-Z0-9]{5}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:1F:90,00:26:62 |oui_eth=00:1F:90,00:26:62 }} '''Wireless Broadband Router (Rev E) for Verizon FiOS'''
[http://www.actiontec.com/products/product.php?pid=188 Product page]
*[[Cavium]] CN5020 based, most likely :[http://www.cavium.com/newsevents_Caviumnetworks_Actiontec_Verizon.html Likely deployed sometime in 2008, per this ''Cavium'' press release]
*[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=409414 Actiontec MI424WR Rev E - DD-WRT forums]
The device uses two ''Entropic Communications'' EN2210 for the coaxial (MoCA) connections.
The default SSID follows a pattern of 5 letters and numbers (example: ''J6W65'').
The power adapter included with the device is an '''Actiontec''' STD-10016U (10V, 1.6A).
